summary: Director Patrik-Ian Polk provides exciting character developments, brilliant cinematography and life lessons for all, particularly for members of the black LGBT community. Cameos by key actors from the Noah Arc series are visual delights.
cast: Jussie Smollett|Blake Young-Fountain|Anthony Burrell|Shanika Warren-Markland|Jeffrey Bowyer-Chapman|Jennia Fredrique Aponte|Robb Sherman|Dustin Ross|Joshua Cruz|Wilson Cruz|Darryl Stephens|Seth Gilliam|Derrick Briggs|Dewayne Queen|Joshua Randle|Antino Crowley-Kamenwati|Hot Rod|B. Scott|Jackie Almonte|Michael Franklin|Ty-Ron Mayes|Austin Patrick McBride|Shaun Ross
keywords: male objectification|tank top|male male kiss|taking off shirt|taking off pants
title: The Skinny
